alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Kanawha, east central Putnam and south central Jackson Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Poca, or near Nitro, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Sissonville, Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Poca, Cross Lanes, Pinch, Institute, Coal Fork, Elkview, Tornado, Teays Valley, Bancroft and Liberty. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 123. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 41 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 87 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 72 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
